message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $120 to me, and I believe it could be valuable to you as well. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. Let me know if this is something you're interested in.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $135?
